entry.title: Israel Says It Found Evidence of Hamas Activity at Gaza Hospital
entry.content: Israel released footage that it said proved the Al-Shifa Hospital compound was being used by Hamas militants, in an episode that carries high stakes for both sides of the war.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What to Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.
